name: ADA Accommodation Request
description: Formal request for reasonable accommodations under the Americans with Disabilities Act

sections.title: ADA ACCOMMODATION REQUEST
2. DISABILITY INFORMATION
sections.content:
I am a person with a disability as defined by the Americans with Disabilities Act. The nature of my disability is as follows:

{disability_description}

sections.title: 3. ACCOMMODATION REQUEST
sections.content:
Due to my disability, I am requesting the following reasonable accommodation(s):

{accommodation_requested}

sections.title: 4. NECESSITY AND EFFECTIVENESS
sections.content: This accommodation is necessary for me to {impact_explanation}

sections.title: 5. HEALTHCARE PROVIDER INFORMATION
sections.content:
My healthcare provider who can verify my disability and the need for accommodation is:

{healthcare_provider}

sections.title: 6. PREVIOUS ACCOMMODATIONS
sections.content:
Previous accommodations that have been effective include:

{previous_accommodations}

sections.title: 7. ALTERNATIVE ACCOMMODATIONS
sections.content:
If the requested accommodation is not possible, I would also consider the following alternatives:

{alternative_accommodations}

sections.title: 8. RELEVANT ADA PROVISIONS
sections.content:
This request is made pursuant to the Americans with Disabilities Act and related regulations, including:

{ada_references}

sections.title: 9. SUPPORTING DOCUMENTATION
sections.content:
I have attached the following documentation to support my request:

{supporting_documents}

sections.title: 10. RESPONSE REQUEST
sections.content: I request a written response to this accommodation request by {response_deadline}. If you need additional information or wish to discuss alternative accommodations, please contact me at the phone number or email address provided above.

sections.title: 11. CLOSING
